item.title: Reading list
item.description:
The reading list

Here is the list for the 2015...

I should probably say some words (maybe some numbers) about the list of the 2014... I’ll think about it.

January

  • Nassim Nicholas Taleb - The Black Swan (2nd edition) : wikipedia
  • Banana Yoshimoto - Kitchen : wikipedia

March

  • Antonio Tabucchi - Sostiene Pereira : wikipedia

April

  • Neal Stephenson - Cryptonomicon : wikipedia

May

  • Cormac McCarthy - The Sunset Limited : wikipedia
  • Niccolo’ Ammaniti - Fango : wikipedia

June

  • Jorge Luis Borges - The Aleph : wikipedia
  • David Foster Wallace - Everything and More: A Compact History of Infinity : wikipedia
  • Daniel Pennac - Storia di un Corpo : wikipedia

July

  • David Foster Wallace - Consider The Lobster : wikipedia
  • Paulo Cohelo - Veronika Decide di Morire : wikipedia
  • Christopher Isherwood - Mr Norris Changes Trains : wikipedia
  • Christopher Isherwood - Goodbye to Berlin : wikipedia
  • Haruki Murakami - Men Without Women : wikipedia
  • Banana Yoshimoto - The Lake : wikipedia

August

  • David Foster Wallace - A Supposedly Fun Thing I’ll Never Do Again : wikipedia
  • Laurence Sterne - The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman (Volume I-II): wikipedia

September

  • Kurt Vonnegut - 2BR02B (short story) : wikipedia
  • Kurt Vonnegut - The Big Trip Up Yonder (short story) : wikipedia
  • Richard Dawkins - The God Delusion : wikipedia
  • Laurence Sterne - The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman (Volume III-IV): wikipedia

October

  • David Foster Wallace - Both Flesh and Not : wikipedia

November

  • Thomas Pynchon - Gravity’s Rainbow : wikipedia

item.title: Reading list
item.description:
The reading list

I thought: “why don’t keep trace of the books that I’ll read in 2014?” … Silly, uh?

By the way, here is the list...

December 2013

… Norwegian Wood - Haruki Murakami, Franz Kafka - The Trial, Heads (manga), Gantz (manga), After Dark - Haruki Murakami, Francis Scott Fitzgerald - The Great Gatsby, Ryūnosuke Akutagawa - In a Grove, The Difference Engine - William Gibson and Bruce Sterling...

January

  • Pattern recognition - William Gibson : link
  • Gantz (manga) - Hiroya Oku : link
  • Heads (manga) - Higashino Keigo : link
  • The Insidious Dottot Fu Manchu - Sax Rohmer : link
  • Dracula’s Guest - Bram Stoker : link
  • Ikigami: The Ultimate Limit (manga) - link
  • The corrections - Jonathan Franzen : link

February

  • A Home at the End of the World - Michael Cunningham : link
  • The Broom of the System - David Foster Wallace : link
  • Welcome to the N.H.K. (manga) - Tatsuhiko Takimoto : link
  • Forty-seven Ronin (Tales of Old Japan) - Algernon Bertram Freeman-Mitford, Lord Redesdale : link
  • Prison of a Billion Years - Stephen Marlowe as C.H. Thames : link
  • Un-Go (manga) - Shō Aikawa : link
  • No. 6 (manga) - Atsuko Asano : link
  • Millennium Actress (manga) - Satoshi Kon : link
  • 5 Centimeters Per Second (manga) - Makoto Shinkai : link

March

  • The place promised in our early days (manga) - Makoto Shinkai : link
  • Samurai Champloo (manga) - Shinichirō Watanabe : link
  • Yotsuba&! (manga) - Kiyohiko Azuma : link
  • Kafka on the Shore - Murakami Haruki : link
  • Cat’s Cradle - Kurt Vonnegut : link
  • The Thirty-Nine Steps - John Buchan : link
  • Spook Country - William Gibson : link

April

  • Dune - Frank Herbert : link
  • Dune Messiah - Frank Herbert : link
  • Sir Gawain and the Green Knight : link
  • No one writes to the colonel - Gabriel García Márquez : link

May

  • Thinking, Fast and Slow - Daniel Kahneman : link
  • Children of Dune - Frank Herbert : link
  • Slaughterhouse-Five - Kurt Vonnegut : link
  • The Elements of Style - William Strunk : link
  • Mastering Bitcoin, Unlocking digital crypto-currencies - Andreas M. Antonopoulos : link
  • Bitcoin and digital currencies - James Cox : link
  • Bitcoin Internals: A Technical Guide to Bitcoin - Chris Clark : link

June

  • I am a Cat - Natsume Sōseki : link
  • Bel Ami - Guy de Maupassant : link

July

  • Dubliners - James Joyce : link
  • Bakuman (manga) - Tsugumi Ohba, Takeshi Obata : link

August

  • 20th Century Boys (manga) - Naoki Urasawa : link
  • 21th Century Boys (manga) - Naoki Urasawa : link
  • Billy Bat- (manga) - Naoki Urasawa : link
  • Candide - Voltaire : link
  • The Cathedral and the Bazaar - Eric S. Raymond : link
  • Bitcoin Exposed: Today’s Complete Guide to Tomorrow’s Currency - Daniel Forrester, Mark Solomon : link
  • Galapagos - Kurt Vonnegut : link
  • Persepolis - Marjane Satrapi (graphic novel) : link

September

  • The Einstein Theory of Relativity - Hendrik Antoon Lorentz : link
  • Beyond the Door (short story) - Philip K. Dick : link
  • De fato - Cicero : link
  • The Most Dangerous Game - Richard Connell : link

October

  • The Death of Ivan Ilyich - Leo Tolstoy : link
  • Dead Souls - Nikolai Gogol : link

November

  • The House of Sleep - Jonathan Coe : link

December

  • What the Dog Saw - Malcom Gladwell : link
  • A Christmas Carol and other Novels - Charles Dickens : link

item.title: Thinking
item.description:
Thinking

Mumble mumble… so much time reading and coding based on my readings… maybe it will come the time to write something useful myself… ^_^

Yup, for now…

item.title: Still alive?
item.description:
still alive?

Yup, still alive… just studying, coding, patching, reading, emacsing… and always rubying!

^_^
